Big Bitcoin

BBC, the abbreviation of Big Bitcoin, is a new chain of 508,888 forked at the height of the bitcoin block, developed by the BBTC team. The Aim of BBTC is to create a better digital currency ecosystem based on bitcoin, and serve a wide range of society on the basis of bitcoin's creditworthiness.

Project name Big Bitcoin（BBC）
Forking Height 508888
Forking Time 2018/2/16(Chinese New Year)
Total Supply 210 Million
Ratio to BTC 1:10
Block Size 16M
Block time 2.5 Minute
Difficulty adjustment DAA
Consensus mechanism EQUI Hash
Replay Protection Yes
Official website Coming Soon
Official team BBC Team
